core.description: The indestructable blade of this scythe is so thin that it glows slightly blue as air molecules are cut into their component parts when they bounce against it.
core.name: The Grimm Squeakers Scythe

core.description: Cheap plate gloves made from bronze.
core.name: Bronze Plate Gloves

core.description: Cheap plate gloves made from bronze.

personal.backstory: The death of rats, rodents and other small furry creatures haunts these murky, smelly depths.

core.description:
The indestructable blade of this scythe is so thin that it glows slightly blue as air molecules are cut into their component parts when they bounce against it.
Successfull strikes do an additional 1d4 shadow damage.
core.name: The Grimm Squeakers Scythe

events.onstrike:
from ezdm_libs.util import rolldice
shadow = rolldice (numdice=1, numsides=4, modifier=0)
campaign.message('%s does additional shadow damage to %s' % (item.displayname(), target.displayname()))
campaign.message(shadow[1])
result = target.take_damage(shadow[0])
campaign.message(result[1])

core.name: Bronze Plate Gloves
